Be Ahead and Stay Connected to the World of Innovation

Giving “wow” experience to your life by pairing with the new technologies. The attractive wearable devices which cover a wide range of Smartwatches, Smart Glasses, etc. are gaining popularity among the millennial. We develop applications for Apple and Android wearable devices.

Our experts have the zeal to explore new technologies and innovate applications which gives the seamless performance and takes user experience to a next level.

Contact Us

Wearable App Development Services

We endeavor to invent for the upcoming wearable app development technologies

Android Wear Apps Development

Offering a huge user base to your business with the help of advantageous features that wearable offers. We create innovative apps for businesses to advertise their products.

Custom Wearable App Development

Customizing wearable apps that are best-fitted for your products and services while adding the value to the user’s lives.

Apple Smart Watch App Development

Our team of iOS developers has developed various iWatch apps from simple to complex apps. We assure to deliver user-friendly app with rich features.

Google Glass App Development

Google Glass is the next futuristic wearable device that is going to leverage numbers of users and will promote businesses at a large platform. We design hi-tech apps that are loaded with impressive features to make it user-friendly app.

API and Back-end System Development

We create efficient back-end systems for the wearable to have better scalability. We optimize web interfaces for intuitive control, data visualization, data optimization and for building APIs.

Wearable UI/UX Design

We create innovative and feature-rich apps to cater to the demands of users through our meticulous embedded programming, interactive displays, and fast data processing.

Empower Your Business with Wearable App Services

Wearable apps are quite a buzz around. Not only are they fascinating, but also make the trendsetters of this time. The core benefit is the availability of a vast number of Android and iOS wearable devices, which suggests a huge pool of opportunities.

Health and Fitness

Deliver better health services to enhance the interest among human brings for better health fitness. Connecting healthcare experts from the various domain at one platform and offering personalized potential wearable devices like fitness bands, Blood Pressure measuring apps, etc.

Banking and Finance

Making banking services highly secure and easy to reach, we create apps to fulfill your financial needs with one touch features. Our expert coders build a highly secure platform for wearable devices.

Businesses and Manufacturing Industries

Creating a platform to outreach a large number of users, we ensure you get the best services for your business domain. Customizing features for offering high scalability for your business growth and productivity.

Best Apps for Best Devices

We develop smart applications for smart and intelligent devices accompanying with high-quality functionalities and user interface. Our applications are best suited for advanced wearable gadgets such as Android wear, Apple iWatch, etc.

Why The NineHertz for Wearable App Development

We at The NineHertz are proud to say that over the 9+ years we have developed 1000+ smartphones applications for many big ventures. Our company offers robust and uncluttered services to our clients. We deploy a pool of zealous and proactive personnel, who believe in diligence over luck and provide robust wearable app development solutions.

The NineHertz offers the top-notch quality of services to fulfill your requirements and enhancing your brand revenue, brand awareness, and customer engagement rate. We provide services for a wide range of domains covering medical, lifestyle, fitness, utilities and gaming. From head to toe, you will be equipped with hi-tech wearable devices which will make your work easy and fun-loving.

As one of the top Mobile App and Web Development Company recognized globally, we are extending our help to our clients in order to identify their scope and extend their reach worldwide.
